Text.Page:
Follow this road west, and you'll find Aron's Camp.

If you truly care about the Fey Forest, , you'll go there and help Nemir figure out why the ill wind blows through the forest, whispering dark promises to all the faeries.
It's not a faerie's...nature, I guess you could say...to be violent. There must be something sinister going on.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"An ill wind?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Exactly! But that's the thing with the wind...

...who knows where it comes from?
